personal.name: TOO HONG YEE JASPER
personal.title: TypeScript & AI-Focused Software Developer
personal.bio: Year 3 Diploma in Information Technology student at Singapore Polytechnic. Passionate about building practical, thoughtful tools using the T3 Stack and AI prompting frameworks. Always building, self-hosting, and experimenting to push the boundaries of everyday tech.

projects.title: Collaborative AI Note-Taking Platform
projects.description: Online note-taking website with interactive AI assistance using Gemini. Built collaboratively with Dean and Yoon Fay using T3 Stack and ShadCN components. I joined the project after initial creation by Dean.

projects.title: AI Video Hook Creator & Self-Hosted Platform
projects.description: Self-hosted video processing platform that transcribes videos, finds compelling hooks, splices them to the front, and generates captions using OpenAI. Built with Flask backend and deployed on Mac Mini with NGINX reverse proxy

projects.title: Spwipe - AI Music Discovery Platform
projects.description: AI-powered music discovery platform that analyzes Spotify playlists and provides song recommendations through a swipe-based interface with vibe profiling
